required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: SHR-1316 in Combination With Chemotherapy in Patients With Esophageal Squamous Cell Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: SHR-1316, a Novel Anti-PD-L1 Antibody, in Combination With Irinotecan Liposome and Fluorouracil in Patients With Esophageal Squamous Cell Cancer: a Phase II Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the progression-free survival (PFS) of Chemotherapy combined with SHR-1316 in patients with advanced esophageal squamous cell cancer.

primary_outcome.description: based on response evaluation criteria in solid tumors 1.1 (RECIST 1.1)

secondary_outcome.description: based on response evaluation criteria in solid tumors 1.1 (RECIST 1.1)
based on response evaluation criteria in solid tumors 1.1 (RECIST 1.1)
OS is defined as the time from registration to death due to any cause, or censored at date last known alive.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Irinotecan liposome plus SHR1316 plus fluorouracil

intervention.description: Irinotecan liposome intravenous infusion will be administered during the first day of treatment.
intervention.arm_group_label: Irinotecan liposome plus SHR1316 plus fluorouracil

intervention.description: SHR-1316 intravenous infusion will be administered during the first day of treatment.
intervention.arm_group_label: Irinotecan liposome plus SHR1316 plus fluorouracil

intervention.description: Fluorouracil intravenous infusion will be administered during the first day of treatment.
intervention.arm_group_label: Irinotecan liposome plus SHR1316 plus fluorouracil
